title: How to rid Weeds from your Garden | 6 Tips from a Farmer

tasks.task: Weeding a garden or high tunnel.
subtasks: Identify and pull perennial weeds by their taproots.
Collect pulled weeds in a bucket for disposal.
Use a hoe or cultivation tool to kill small weeds.
Plant in straight rows to facilitate weeding.
Use weed barrier material around the garden perimeter.

tasks.task: Maintaining a high tunnel or greenhouse.
subtasks: Eradicate weeds from the soil's surface.
Apply weed control techniques consistently on a regular schedule.
Maintain straight rows for easier weed removal.
Utilize weed barrier to prevent weed growth at the garden's edges.
